org.openhab.binding.velux.internal.bridge

Interface VeluxBridgeInstance

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VeluxBridgeHandler

    @NonNullByDefault
public interface VeluxBridgeInstance
    This interface is implemented by classes that deal with a specific Velux bridge and its configuration.

    Configuration

    • VeluxBridgeConfiguration for specification by a specific Velux bridge,

    Status

    Two methods for bridge-internal configuration retrieval:
    • existingProducts() for retrieving scene information,
    • existingScenes() for retrieving product information.
    Author:
    Guenther Schreiner - Initial contribution
    See Also:
    VeluxBridgeProvider

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VeluxExistingProducts existingProducts()
      Information retrieved by VeluxBridgeActuators.getProducts(org.openhab.binding.velux.internal.bridge.VeluxBridge)
      VeluxExistingScenes existingScenes()
      Information retrieved by VeluxBridgeScenes.getScenes(org.openhab.binding.velux.internal.bridge.VeluxBridge)
      VeluxBridgeConfiguration veluxBridgeConfiguration()
      Bridge configuration

    • Method Detail

      • veluxBridgeConfiguration

        VeluxBridgeConfiguration veluxBridgeConfiguration()
        Bridge configuration
        Returns:
        VeluxBridgeConfiguration containing all bridge configuration settings.

      • existingProducts

        VeluxExistingProducts existingProducts()
        Information retrieved by VeluxBridgeActuators.getProducts(org.openhab.binding.velux.internal.bridge.VeluxBridge)
        Returns:
        VeluxExistingProducts containing all registered products, or null in case of any error.

      • existingScenes

        VeluxExistingScenes existingScenes()
        Information retrieved by VeluxBridgeScenes.getScenes(org.openhab.binding.velux.internal.bridge.VeluxBridge)
        Returns:
        VeluxExistingScenes containing all registered scenes, or null in case of any error.
